synopsis.text:
Haseo's first foray into the revamped MMORPG, The World R:2, takes an unexpected turn when he falls prey to a Player Killer (PK). Just as hope seems lost, the enigmatic Ovan, leader of the Twilight Brigade guild, swoops in to save him. Intrigued by Haseo's unique abilities, Ovan invites him to join their quest for the elusive Key of the Twilight, an object of legend coveted by rival guilds.

As Haseo navigates this immersive virtual reality, he forms a close bond with his fellow guild members, especially Shino, a female Harvest. However, their peaceful existence is shattered when Shino's character is ruthlessly attacked by the infamous Tri-Edge, leaving her comatose in the real world. Consumed by vengeance, Haseo vows to track down Tri-Edge and put an end to his reign of terror.

Set against the backdrop of CC Corporation's rebuilt game following a devastating data centre fire, this anime explores the camaraderie, challenges, and dangers faced by players in The World R:2. As Haseo embarks on his perilous journey, he must confront the harsh realities of this virtual world and the mysterious figure threatening everything he holds dear.
